assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Sowmiya Moorthie, Hannah Blencowe, Matthew Darlison, Joy Lawn, Pierpaolo Mastroiacovo, Joan K Morris, Bernadette Modell, and the Congenital Disorders Expert Group declare they have no conflict of interest. This article does not contain any studies with human or animal subjects performed by any of the authors.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This work was supported by grants from the WHO Regional Office for the Eastern Mediterranean. The time of SM and HB was funded in part through a grant from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation to the Child Health Epidemiology Reference Group (CHERG).

funder.name: WHO Regional Office for the Eastern Mediterranean
